campaign.story:
eSlim is an electric sonic toothbrush that has all the power and performance of your average electric toothbrush with the addition of an ultra-slim and portable design. Upgrade your dental routine with high-end DuPont bristles with the perfect level of comfort. You'll have that crystal clear smile in no time.
We approached the design process bias-free to create something that truly reflects what people want - a product that has yet to be discovered by the majority; unique but in-demand.
Dental care is an essential part of our daily routine that is often overlooked. We invest more than ever in other health gadgets but our teeth are often ignored, despite the fact that damage to teeth is irreversible. To solve this, all you need is a portable sonic toothbrush that you can take anywhere.
eSlim provides a premium brushing experience for all, allowing you to simply & easily adapt its portability, aesthetics, functionality & performance to match your needs.
Matching the look of the toothbrush to your modern lifestyle and elevating your brushing quality with DuPont brush filaments, three brushing modes, a convenient removable travel cap, and fine-crafted body tube —— all seamlessly into one instrument.
Our goal was simple - to design the world's best portable sonic toothbrush to make you feel confident using it in any situation and maintaining good oral hygiene.

We sought to create a certain aesthetic by combining simplicity, style, elegance, and glamour for the most exclusive product without sacrificing essential functionality. To achieve this high standard, three foundations were necessary.
(1) Premium Material — eSlim is all about uniqueness and comfort.  The body is made out of 304 food-grade stainless steel / 6063-grade aluminum alloy that is very durable, and scratch-resistant.
6063 grade of Aluminum Alloy
304 food-grade Stainless Steel
(2) Surface Treatment — eSlim impressed a valued client with its excellent finishing treatments, which includes vacuum ion sputtering (PVD), anodizing, andanti-fingerprint treatments.
(3)  High-Quality Brush Filaments — eSlim's high comfort level is guaranteed. Dentists advise using what feels comfortable and encourage you to brush regularly & correctly. We took that to heart by using DuPont® nylon, which issimply the best.
Attraction starts with the first impression
eSlim comes in vibrant colors with a rich satin finish. The brush fits into an elegant cap that encases the entire brush seamlessly for an even more streamlined look.
There are three cleaning modes available at the click of a button⎯ Cleaning, Massage, and Whitening
Smart Brushing
The timing function helps you cultivate healthy brushing habits. A vibrating reminder every 30 seconds indicates when you have finished cleaning one area of the mouth, prompting you to continue to another area for a more consistent and thorough cleaning experience.

Excellent Comfort
eSlim aims to provide the softest and most comfortable cleaning experience. DuPont® produces very high-quality brushes with a balance of consistent quality, wear performance and unmatched productivities in tufting and end-rounding by using DuPont filaments.

High Vibration, Deep Cleaning
With the highest vibration speed at up to 27,000 vibrations per minute, the newly designed high-speed sonic micro-motor is user-friendly comfortable and efficient.
Very Quiet
eSlim operates at just 60dB, which is considerably quieter compared to the high pitched buzzing of other sonic toothbrushes - allows you to brush with little disturbance to others.
IP X7 Waterproof
The waterproof performance of the product meets the IP X7 Waterproof standard. This standard ensures effective performance even if the USB port is exposed to the environment for a long period of time. Most importantly, the Micro USB Port itself (while unplugged) is IP X7 water-resistant as well, which means even if water enters the port, it will not damage the toothbrush.
Comes with a waterproof plug
Ventilated & Deodorizing
The easy-to-open design easily snaps into place and keeps bristles straight for effective cleaning. Ventilated toothbrush covers protect the brush head and keep it dry between uses. The antibacterial coating keeps the cover clean as well.
ANTIBACTERIAL PROTECTION
These toothbrush covers will protect any manual toothbrush & help keep the brush head hygienic. Compact and designed for portability and easy packing, they can be used at home or for work, school or travel.

EASY, PORTABLE STORAGE
The toothbrush cover easily snaps into place. It features an antibacterial coating to keep your brush cleaner between uses at home or on the go, and the cover is ventilated to allow the brush head to dry between uses.
Attraction starts with the first impression⎯⎯  eSlim comes in a gorgeous color selection, a rich satin finish, and the brush rests in an elegant cap that connects to the body tube seamlessly
Due to the premium quality of the Aluminium Alloy, the production costs are substantial. If you would like the red Aluminium Alloy toothbrush, please add an extra $10USD which is $78HKD onto your reward:-)
Aluminum Alloy
Stainless Steel
Get free upgrades by simply sharing eSlim with your friends!
With 1 referral, you will get an extra brush head.
With 3 referrals, you will get a free red Aluminium toothbrush.

How to share:
(1) First, back an eSlim.
(2) Once you are a backer, log in to your Kickstarter account.
(3) Message us on Kickstarter or email us at marketing@odaycare.com, and we will give you a unique link.
Or, join the Kickbooster’s referral program - refer a friend to our campaign and you will receive 10% of their pledge amount.
How to join:
 Click the button and register as a Booster.
Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!
Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!
 
Merry Christmas and happy new year in advance! By backing this reward, you will receive two Aluminium toothbrushes and two Stainless toothbrushes, and the color is selectable. Also, we will include one FREE red Aluminium Alloy toothbrush in your package!

If you want to buy our perfectly designed accessory in the gift pack, you can select it as a perk, which will ensure a cheaper price and lower shipping costs
 +USD$3 for Brush Head * 1 (HKD$25)
 +USD$6 for Travel Bag * 1 (HKD$50)
（ex: add $3+$3+$6=$12 for 2 × Brush Head & 1 × Travel Bag）

How to add:
You can tell us your color preference, any accessories want, and any other information on the survey after the campaign ends. 


The Oday Standard Christmas Gift Set Includes:
 eSlim Aluminum Sonic Toothbrush * 1
   Toothbrush Head * 3
   Micro USB Cable * 1
   Rubber Dust Cover * 1
  Oday's core team members
When utility meets elegance, it means everything is elevated. Meet the brand new design of the revolutionary electric toothbrush by Odaycare - The most luxurious, high-performance toothbrush crafted with the finest materials and most innovative technology.
Over the years, we have been deeply involved in the field of oral care products, with deep industry chain resources, and commitment to creating a new generation of oral care products and services that consumers can trust. We have a first-class domestic design team, experienced in both industrial design and oral care product design. Our partners include Pedex, Dupont, Cashew, and more. Industry benchmark brand. We use our superior industrial resources to create a new generation of oral care products that are practical, efficient and stylish.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
No project is without risk and challenges but we try to do our absolute best to minimize them. 

We feel that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to moving on to crowdfunding. 

With your support, we can bring eSlim to every pursuing a higher quality of life. 

We have started mass production and your contribution will help us achieve economies of scale and keep the product cost low. 

As the first step of helping people find out and enjoy what technology development could actually achieve and bring to our life, we have upgraded the sonic toothbrush to provide an even better cleaning experience without sacrificing portability. 

Motivated by what we have already achieved, we will continue to spare no efforts to come up with more fun and innovative ideas. A

t this point, we have enough materials to manufacture about 3,000 units now. Beyond that, the lead time is about a month. 

Your strong support will give us the assurance we need to place a larger order of raw materials and begin mass production earlier.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Thanks ,We are ready to ship soon!
updates.update_content:
Due to the impact of the traditional Chinese New Year holiday and the the Coronavirus situation in China, the logistics system was disrupted, so our orders could not be delivered as scheduled. We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.
Now,we are glad to inform you that your order will be shipped within a week.

Hi backers,

Sorry to inform that due to the Coronavirus, most of the companies are suspend working for nearly one month, including the logistics company. So there might be a little delay(about 2 weeks) on the shipment too. All of the packages are ready to ship, we will ship them out as soon as the logistics company return to work.

Hi backers,

Sorry for the late update, we were having the Spring Festival last month. We really appreciate all your supports, and now the shipment almost begins.

Hi everyone!

The survey has already sent out, please check out your mailbox:)

The sooner you finish the survey, the quicker we can begin the shipment:-D

Hi everyone!

Our project is successfully ending today! THANK YOU ALL! 
We couldn't make this without any of you, each of us really appreciated that. We will keep you updated about the progress of production. If you have any inquiries, please feel free to leave a comment or email us at marketing@odaycare.com.

Hi friends!

Merry Christmas to all of you! We really appreciate you help us reach this far, this is a great honor to us.

Dear friends,

eSlim hit its goal in less than 24 hours, which means we are 100% guarantee shipping now! Thank you guys, we couldn't be done this without you. To return your support, we introducing our referral programs here - only share, and win free gifts or cash rebates.

unique

Dear friends,   

Greetings to the Kickstarter family! Thank you for letting eSlim join your daily routine, we truly hope that diamond clean smile can be with you anytime. 

 In order to express our sincere wishes, the first 200 orders will be sent out on Dec 20th!

campaign.story:
Smoko loves bringing you products that really put the "fun" in function to put a little joy into your everyday. We couldn't be more excited to introduce two new Lil B Dumpling products: Lil B Dumpling Diffuser & Lil B Dumpling Air Purifier.
Lil B Dumpling Diffuser (also a mini humidifier) is just, well, essential. Pun totally intended. Lil B Dumpling works as both a humidifier, great for adding some healthy moisture to the air for a good 6 to 8 hours, and an essential oil diffuser. Just add your favorite oils!

This cute Lil B Dumpling Air Purifier filters pollen and dust to keep you air fresh. This compact air purifier can be plugged in to any outlet socket or your computer USB port. UV light on top of this air purifier is effective at killing bacteria, viruses, mold, and other pathogens. The bottom filter can trap a high percentage of airborne  allergens and irritants that flows through the filters.
See right side for more pledge reward details!
All pledge reward products
Dumpling Kawaii Pop (Phone case not included ☺)
Yellow Dumpling Ambient Light (Requires 3x AAA Batteries)
Dumpling Diffuser
Dumpling Air Purifier
*Please note: Timeline may be subject to change due to things that may affect the estimated delivery time.
Thank you so much for your support and love for our products! For additional information, please visit our website www.smokonow.com. LET'S KICK IT!

campaign.story:
Introducing SomerSide- The world's most uniquely designed and technologically advanced towel for your travels and everyday adventures
Stylish, convenient, and eco with 10 features and made from recycled plastic bottles, It's the first towel of its kind. 
More sustainable, more stylish, and more functional, created to suit your lifestyle. Unbelievably soft, enjoy every activity and everyday in functional comfort with SomerSide. 
Pack SomerSide for the day because you never know where the day will lead. From waterfalls and road trips to beach days, you can DO MORE WITH LESS. 
The only limit on what you can do is your imagination 
Each towel saves 8-14 recycled plastic bottles from ending up in landfills or among our marine friends. 
We’ve transformed discarded plastic bottles into the more uniquely designed and versatile towel. 
Why? Because every minute half a million plastic bottles are NOT being recycled and ending up in landfill or our oceans. SomerSide believes strongly in caring for our planet and bringing the most innovative and technology advanced towel to the market. We want to help keep plastic out of our oceans and forests, one towel at a time. We use a high grade of PET to bring you upmost quality.
 The Process
PLAY

Read the full testimonials further down this page 
The three designs are given in detail below

As part of our stretch goals, we've added in the Dreamtime as XL
SomerSide towels are large with a unique double sided design that you'll want to take with you everywhere.
Hide your valuables, SomerSide is the only towel with a hidden zip pocket. Take a dip without the worry, You never have to worry about asking someone to watch your stuff at the beach again! Carry only the essentials to the beach, perfect for surfers who worry about where to put their key when they're out in the water.
You can also put sunscreen, spare bather bottoms, lip balm, a small snack- the essentials and more
Not a fan of microfibre towels because they often feel like you're drying yourself with paper? SomerSide towels have been designed to be soft against your skin so you can enjoy using it like any other towel. We've used the most innovative technology to create soft thread from recycled plastic with a 15% blend of Nylon for that extra softness.
SomerSide towels have odor resistant properties so leave your wet towel in your bag for the day without the worry. 
Save space in your everyday bag and luggage. Weighing in at only 400 grams and rolling to the size of a small plastic bottle, SomerSide is the perfect towel for on-the-go, no matter whether you're a roller, folder or scruncher.  
Leave the sandcastles at the beach where they belong with SomerSide's sand-free technology.  If you ever avoid the beach just because you hate the idea of having sand everywhere, SomerSide towels allow you to have your fun in the sun without worrying and the sand!
SomerSide towels dry 3 times faster than a regular cotton towel so you can be ready from one adventure to the next. From morning yoga, to a sunset surf and picnic, use it again and again.
Dry off quickly and easily, the water brushes off your skin and absorbs into the towel right away. Whether you're out of the shower, pool, ocean, or any water, Somerside towels are ultra Absorbent.
Sick of throwing your towel on the rack and hope it doesn't fall? Hang SomerSide anywhere to dry for your convenience with our elastic hanging hook. Placed cleverly in the middle of the towel so the bottom of the towel doesn't drag on the floor
We are bigger than a regular beach towel and our XL is great for two or for those who like some extra room. The XL doubles up as a picnic blanket for your friends and family! Our XL is currently only available in the Moroccan Mint and Aussie Dreamtime.
All our towels come in a pouch made from the same material as the towel so they're eco, soft, quick dry etc. Very handy to put wet swimwear in, easy to wash like the towels, and also a great snack bag for the beach!
Whether you like the outdoors, travelling , the beach, you're a triathlete, a festival goer, a diver, or just enjoy an active lifestyle, Everyone needs a towel. 


DELIVERY FOR CHRISTMAS! 
30% more waste is generated on Christmas Day than the rest of the year. This waste is largely related to consumer gifting, Australians alone throw out 20 million unwanted gifts and enough wrapping paper to wrap the earth's equator 4 times. Australia only has 0.33% of the total world population.... not even 1%.We want to help you and the planet by minimising waste this holiday season. Rather than gifting more plastic, gift SomerSide, a present people will love that helps the environment. 
Founder, Gabby giving some behind the scenes information on our manufacturing and timeline
PLAY

FREE SHIPPING TO ALL ORDERS IN AUSTRALIA & NZ
Not the number or combination of towels you are looking for? No problems we can add them on manually. Please send us an email at support@somerside.com.au with the subject line 'custom reward' and we will get back to you ASAP! Expect a response within 24 hours. We want to make sure we deliver your order correctly and so we need to make note of all custom orders. 
FREE SHIPPING TO ALL ORDERS IN AUSTRALIA & NZ
All our early bird rewards offer discounted worldwide shipping for those backers that have supported us from the start. Our Santa Pack also offers discounted shipping because we want to help all the eco-gift givers out there. 
Our shipping base is located in Melbourne, Australia and will be mailed out from there. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. Aus Domestic shipments will take 3-5 business days. We are a small business and unfortunately cannot offer free worldwide shipping at this point in time but we can offer you a great product at an excellent discount. 
CUSTOM DUTIES AND TAX
Cannot mark as gift, this is illegal, so we will not be able to do this. Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.
Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB Destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter. 
I've always been an adventurous and active soul that can’t quite commit to having my feet in one place. Having travelled for years and worked in the travel and sporting industry, the idea stemmed from the necessity to have a versatile and beautiful towel that could be used for every activity. Personal style has always been important to me and I've combined that with the functionality and versatility of the outdoors. 
SomerSide was created as a more sustainable product to keep plastic out of our oceans and forests. I took up surfing whilst living in Bali, and I quickly noticed how polluted the water was with plastic, it was everywhere. It hit me- literally. I've been hit by nappies, plastic cups, a bag caught on my foot and even have a small scar on my ankle from a sharp piece of rubbish that hit me in the water.  Protecting our environment is very important to SomerSide and myself and we will constantly strive to implement sustainable practices in everything we do. SomerSide is about doing more while using less. 
Thank you for support!
Gabriella Samkova

Thank you to the Community Creatives for an amazing job in the photography and video production of this campaign
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Unlike a lot of Kickstarter projects, we've put countless hours and our savings into manufacturing and testing SomerSide. The next order which you will help fund will be version 3, which has already been customer tested and all the small kinks resolved. We have a manufacturer that we will be working with and have discussed our timeline to ensure delivery for Christmas. 

However, things can always happen that are beyond our control, and we do our best to communicate those challenges up front and as they arise as we have from the beginning. These include unforseen shipping delays, problems in our factory partners, government shutdowns, and more. We promise to do our best to keep our customers updated with the progress and satisfied with the final product. Your support means a lot to us and we want to ensure you’re happy with the product, people, and company you’ve backed!

In case you have questions, feel free to reach out to us at support@somerside.com.au and our team will be happy to assist you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hello to all our wonderful backers!
I hope you’re all safe and well. We've got some exciting updates for you from SomerSide HQ.
Family & Friends Xmas Special
We know 2020 has been a difficult time for many and Christmas can be an even harder time so we would like to invite you to a special family & friends xams discount to make those Christmas presents that little bit more affordable. After all, we have you to thank for getting us here. If you are interested, please subscribe at the bottom of our website & look out for the invite next week! 
Named Top 50 In Small Business Leaders

updates.update_userinfo: 🎉It's Our First Birthday & We Want To Say Thank You To All Those That Made It Happen 🎉
updates.update_content:
🎉It's Our First Birthday 🎉
Whilst we are grabbing ourselves a well deserved drink, we wanted to thank you for helping make this happen by offering 15% off our sustainable sand free towels with the code SSBIRTHDAY at checkout via our website www.somerside.com.au. It's been a crazy year with so much time spent locked up indoors, it's time to look forward to new adventures & we'd love to part of it🤙🏽

Hello to all our wonderful backers,
2020 certainly has been a whirlwind of a year and I hope you are all well & safe. 
Some Exciting News
Attention to all our North American backers, we are excited to announce that we have launched SomerSide Sustainable Beach & Travel Towels on just in time for summer ☀️ 🎉 It’s been a massive few months for us but we are so excited to be able to offer to our North American friends 😎 We currently have a special offer so if you're interested in grabbing a few more for summer you can by visiting .

FALL IN LOVE WITH OUR NEW DESIGNS

campaign.story:
We are back with a brand new and improved version of our AvoSeedo, which has already sold more than half a million units to date. AvoSeedo has been developed to facilitate the germination process of avocados. It has never been easier to grow your own avocado trees!   
Avocados have been grown as a crop plant since ancient times. Originating from Latin America, the enormous nutritive value of ahuacatl, the Aztec word for avocado, was well known amongst the indigenous population. But it was only a century ago that the avocado found a new home in (southern) Europe. Nowadays, the pear-shaped, alligator-skinned fruits are a common sight in pretty much every supermarket – and on our tables. Being outright tasty when consumed fresh and raw, they can also be refined with spices (resulting in the famous guacamole) or stuffed with any filling that pleases your tongue.  
Although avocado trees like to be warm and cozy, they can handle lower average temperatures (as in central Europe, the US or Canada) quite well. The seed of every supermarket avocado can be made to germinate and grow to full size (up to 15 meters!). However, merely putting the seed in the ground usually won’t work. Instead, the “pointy” end should be facing the sun (without being exposed to permanent, direct sunlight). At the same time, the flattened end should be wet all the time.  
The main challenge when growing an avocado is to keep it wet all the time. If the seed is left high and dry at any time, there’s a chance that the germination process will stop permanently. And this is where AvoSeedo comes to the rescue. 
AvoSeedo is a revolutionary way to grow the perfect avocados without all the usual hassle that it takes to grow these fussy plants. But what’s new with this version of the AvoSeedo?
This version will have your kiddies loving growing their very own pet avocados. The AvoSeedo is shaped like a bear, and comes with many different stickers so that they can customize the look of their little pet. 
It also comes with a bowl for the AvoSeedo to swim in. There is a little cut out that comes with the pot so that kids can make it look like a pool or garden. So much fun!
AvoSeedo is the perfect little gadget for kids and everyone who loves to grow plants. Avocados are known to be challenging to grow, but with AvoSeedo’s nifty and brand new design, avocados will grow quickly and easily. 
Well for starters, it’s the easiest way to grow avocados. Our new design is sure to capture kids’ attention. The normally very demanding germination of avocados will be a breeze! 
AvoSeedo is a small, yet intricate tool, which works on the same principle as the toothpick method, only better.  Due to its low weight and high displacement, AvoSeedo will remain at the surface all the time. When the water level lowers, AvoSeedo will sink accordingly.  
Compared to the original toothpick method, there’s another advantage: the avocado seed doesn’t need to be perforated, reducing the risk of damage and injury. 
Due to its smart design, success rates of germinating avocados will increase dramatically. Watering intervals will be reduced, as water levels only need to be checked now and then. 
As long as some water remains in the pot or pond, the pit stays wet and there is little chance that the seed will dry out – thanks to the ground hole. It also allows the developing roots to grow and to expand freely. By the way, the hole is not simply round but has the shape of a heart instead. While this may as well add to the cuteness factor of the new AvoSeedo, it is also a functional feature. It makes sure that avocado seeds of all sizes will be held firmly in its place. Even if the seed cracks open during the germination process, it won’t sink.
The brand new AvoSeedo is, without a doubt, the easiest way to germinate avocados, and kids will love their new ‘pet’. 
Here are the main benefits of AvoSeedo:
Easy to use – peel the avocado pit, put it into the AvoSeedo and presto, it’s ready to go.
No attention needed – due to the smart design of the AvoSeedo, it requires minimal care and will germinate without any hassles.
Great design – easy to use with a great design that will capture kids’ imaginations.
Highly durable – the AvoSeedo will last for years as it’s made from super strong plastic.
Non-toxic – it is BPA and DEHP free.
All in all, AvoSeedo is simply the perfect tool for you to grow avocado trees at home. The difficult germination period can now be mastered with almost no effort – giving your new trees an edge right from the beginning!
AvoSeedo 2.0 is already in the works!
We are already working on the injection mold and start testing very soon. This is great news for you as this decreases the time until it arrives in your home dramatically.

The risk is limited. I already have a manufacturer, the injection mold is also almost done and production will start soon. However, there is a risk that the mold may take longer to finish as planned but this will only affect the delivery date.

campaign.story:
We want to give the power to the people to help change the world each time they brush their teeth. Positively impacting the environment as well as their lifestyles.
We are simply re-designing an everyday object into something much more sustainable and not to mention sexier...


If you wish you to order in bulk, please contact us by email at info@tooth.eco
If you are ordering 2 or more units, it will all be bundled up together into one shipping cost.
 With your help and support you will be funding:
 Injection moulding tools
The biggest investment required for Eco Tooth to go from a dream to reality, is the making of the injection moulding tools. In total, we need 3 of these tools: one for Tooth.Head, one for the outer part of Tooth.Travel and one for the inner part of Tooth.Travel.
First production runs
After setting up the manufacturing process, it will be time to start the first production. In order to do so, we will need to purchase various recycled raw materials as well as cover the costs of our manufacturing partners' operations to produce the first ever batch of Tooth. 
 Subscription service & online shop
To enable an easier lifestyle, Tooth works with a subscription. To make this happen, we must set up an online shop and partner with the right logistics company to ensure our Tooth products get delivered on time.
Through intensive research and surveys, it was important for us consider all the functionalities of the everyday toothbrush. Going from "single use" to a more durable and sustainable design, as well as incorporating a modern look, Tooth is a byproduct of a team of eco-conscious engineers and designers.  
Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Delivery time: There is always a risk that our suppliers do not deliver on time or there will be manufacturing hiccups, however, we are very confident that we will be able to meet our April delivery schedule.

Customs: There are some countries which may encounter some issues. This is not relevant for the EU, JP, AU, SG, HK, UK, MY and US.

We'll keep you updated regularly on the progress of the project, and if there are any issues along the way, we'll let you know!

We want to be as transparent as possible from build to delivery.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
The handle of the brush is made from 100% recycled aluminium, The stand is made from recycled stainless steel. It goes without saying we offer a lifetime guarantee while subscribed. 
Tooth and all of its accessories have been designed and built to last.
Reusability and recyclability
Tooth’s handle being made from recycled aluminium means you do not have to keep manufacturing the handle each time, using valuable resources and creating excess CO2 emissions like standard bamboo or plastic brushes.
Sustainable materials
The brush head (body) is made from Floreon. A material that is made from locally sourced (UK) sugar beets. The bristles of the brush are made from Nylon 4 which is 100% biodegradable. Sustainable living just got easy.
Environmentally friendly factories
We handpicked our factories to make sure that they comply wit hour high standards. Every by-product that comes from manufacturing a unit we have made sure we can reuse it in a future product of an existing product line. Producing minimal waste and trying to be as circular of an economy as possible is key to our company ethos.
Sustainable Distribution
We collate all of our order data weekly, pick, pack and deliver only once a week. This keeps CO2 emissions down from fulfilment to font door.

updates.update_content:
Hi there,
Let’s get down to it, we’re not going to make our delivery date. We’ve had a set back at our TOOTH.HEAD manufacturer which means we won’t make our April shipping deadline. We are hoping to receive the stock in the next couple of months.
We want to make sure that we’re 100% happy with the products before shipping them to you.

Hi there,
We hope you're doing well.  We've been busy preparing to receive our product shipments and getting ready to officially launch Tooth!
It's safe to say that we will be starting to ship out our 4000+ pre-orders between the end of April and beginning of May. Because we have such a high quantity of orders, we can only give you a rough timeframe, as we'll be fulfilling the orders in batches. More details will be given closer to that time.
, please make sure to contact us at and we'll make the changes for you.

Hi there,
Hope your February is going well. Things are looking up on our end and we'll be announcing a delivery date soon. So hang tight!

Hi there,
Hope you’re doing well and are staying positive. It’s been a crazy start to the year 2021, with more lockdowns, spikes in Coronavirus cases, US mobs and the list goes on…
But we made it. This year will be the year for Tooth.

Hello,
We hope you're well. Here to let you know that we'll be locking in your shipping address on Wednesday the 23rd of December. This week will be the final chance for you to update your shipping address.

How to update my shipping address?

Hi there,
November has been a busy month for us, as we race towards the finish line but December will be even busier. December will be as busy for us as it is for the rest of the world so, we were advised by our partners that we should start shipping our products out to you, early January instead of December.
This is due to a number of reasons which includes, postal services being flooded with a high risk of parcels getting lost during the very busy holiday season and staff shortages because of COVID-19. We apologise for this, as we understand that some of you were hoping to receive our products in time for the gifting season.

updates.update_userinfo: December is going to be BUSY!
updates.update_content:
Hi there,

After last months hiccup, we want to thank you for your understanding. We are so grateful for all the positivity and support we have received this past month. October has been very positive for us. Inching closer and closer to our December delivery date, progress has been made and we are expecting our very first production samples very soon (more on that a bit later).

updates.update_userinfo: October Update: We are so close!
updates.update_content:
Hi there,

This month's product update has been hard to write. Although we have some good news to share with you, we’ve hit a major bump in the road – our manufacturer has let us down on delivering the Nylon 4 biodegradable bristle, so we have had to look for alternatives.
We don’t want to delay getting the eco toothbrush sets out to you, as Covid-19 has already delayed us for too long. So, we’ve made the difficult decision to give you(the head is already biodegradable as it made from Floreon) in order to fulfil our commitment to you as quickly as we can.

updates.update_userinfo: A BIG bump on the road...
updates.update_content:
Hi there,
Summer is officially over but this means we are getting closer to our launch date, and boy, we have been BUSY! Summer for us has been mostly indoors, in front of our computers, typing and clicking away. All of it is worth it because every second spent working, is every second closer to ship Tooth to you. 
Things are moving quite swiftly and we're still on target for December 2020.

campaign.story:
Sign up HERE if you're interested in Craftmotif and we'll let you know when it's available. 
Get in touch! 
For any questions or suggestions - feel free to email us at info@craftmotif.com
Craftmotif™ is a unique pen to land your best ideas and thoughts onto the paper. 
Craftmotif - Brushed / Blue
Inspired by retro aircraft, the Craftmotif's vibrant, playful and aesthetic design makes for a one-of-a-kind daily writing instrument, conversation starter, design inspiration and decorative object bringing a special accent to your home and workspace.
In a digital world, elements of old ways in tangible, well-crafted items stand out and make daily tasks special.
Craftmotif - Polished / Yellow
Linking modern technology and craftsmanship with classic aerospace design motifs and materials, the Craftmotif brings careful considerations of design, construction and usability. 
Built to last. Built to be noticed.
It's precision-machined, aerospace-grade aluminum body houses a durable, soft-twist action mechanism with a rechargeable cartridge inside,  so the pen is built to bring decades of use and enjoyment.
Craftmotif - Tumbled / Red
Soft - Twist Action Mechanism
Made to be your daily companion.
On the go or on display.
Each Craftmotif comes with a specially designed magnetic display stand which keeps it neatly elevated, as well as a leather case, giving you the opportunity to take it wherever you go or display it in your favorite spaces. 
Craftmotif - Polished / Yellow
Magnetic Display Stand
DESIGN
With hand-applied enamel details and the silver-tone aerospace aluminum body, streamlined shape of the Craftmotif makes for a pleasant writing instrument with added appeal and personality.
 A unique combination of aircraft motifs with mindful consideration of functionality. Simplistic design meets carefully chosen materials and features.
 Streamlined shape and balanced weight feel subtle in the hand and offer an enjoyable writing experience. 
The magnetic stand which is made of stainless steel, keeps Craftmotif neatly elevated.
 Craftmotif - 1 logo is engraved where the pen meets the magnetic stand. 
 Grooves provide additional grip while creating a subtle and graphic pattern detail. 
 Enamel details on the retro-themed roundels complement the silver-tone, aluminum body. 
Leather Pen Sleeve
Available in 3 Design Variations.
Each version of the Craftmotif has its own specially selected surface finishing, leather sleeve and enamel-plated roundel colorway. Choose your favorite design and discover a meaningful gift idea for someone special.
Craftmotif - Polished / Yellow
Hand buffed to a shiny polish, this version comes with yellow roundel and black matte pen sleeve for added contrast.
 Craftmotif - Tumbled / Red 
A tumbling technique achieves a smooth, slightly textured pattern unique to each piece, complete with matching red roundel and a dark grey leather sleeve color combination.
 Craftmotif - Brushed / Blue
An aluminum brushing method provides a smooth matte finish, matched with a sky blue roundel and light grey pen sleeve.
Features
Each Craftmotif is made from solid, aerospace-grade 6061-T6 aluminum, using advanced precision-machining methods in combination with hand to ensure lifelong quality. Dimensions, weight, and scale are thoughtfully developed for pleasure and ease of use. 
Refills
Designed using the reliable and classic Schmidt MINE S635 D1 ballpoint, each pen comes with a five-pack of black or blue cartridges for a long lasting supply of ink, which can easily be replaced.
If you have your own preference of refills, the Craftmotif takes any standard D1 refill cartridges, which are widely available.   
Get in touch! 
For any questions, press inquiries or you simply fancy a hi! - feel free to email us at info@craftmotif.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having launched multiple projects before the Craftmotif, we have considerable experience in bringing products to life and running successful campaigns. We have dedicated a large amount of time to each step of the Craftmotif prototype’s development process to ensure a high-quality product, stay on our scheduled timeline, and prepare for the production process. We have worked diligently to address any challenges and prepare for a successful launch.

While there is always a chance of unexpected obstacles when bringing a new product to life, our experience has taught us how to navigate various challenges by proactively addressing them and working towards solutions. In the past, we have always cleared obstacles quickly with a commitment to quality and the trust of our backers. We’re confident that our team has the ability, experience, and knowledge to execute this project and ensure the success of the Craftmotif. 

From its initial reception and prototyping, the Craftmotif shows strong promise and we will keep our backers informed of the project’s development with regular communication. Our number-one priority is providing you with the best customer satisfaction and product—and that begins with deep respect for those who support us.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello Everyone, I am new to this platform and I believe that by using this platform, I’ll be able to fulfil my dream as a creator. Therefore, I have named it, “The Hawk”.
Over the past 2 years, I have primarily been working on design & tested various type of knives. I have been working along this line with full commitment and throughout the whole process my priority have been to provide the best possible ergonomic handle and well balanced design for the ease of use. I want to ensure that this knife also meet the highest standards with specific guidelines such as blade, material & resources for better efficiency.
BLADE:
The 330 Layered Damascus blade must impress you as the details are so sharp and beautifully attractive patterns. It is long-lasting due to its rustproof blade making it first choice for any professional chefs.
HANDLE:
Walnut wood is extremely tough and therefore, it is the best possible combination to go with Damascus blade. The straight grain retains the traditional look and feel with light to a very deep brown colour.
I have been collecting knives for many years, I do understand the uniqueness and the highly customised process of creating it. From the design prospective to the actual product, it is where every knife will go through a comparable strength and sharpness test during production to provide you all with distinctive wavy pattern and durability to the blade. 
The Hawk
Love for small knives lead us to this creation, a perfect sharp & balanced knife which can be used with fully comfort, indoor as well as out door. 
There are lots of cheap "Damascus" knockoff knives in the market. I have owned few myself previously and one can notice straight away how badly they are made. Most noticeable fact is that the metal has weak spots and is made up from poor quality materials.   
My own determination has been over the time to choose the right brand of Damascus and provide you all with something that is pretty and practical in terms of usage. With my knowledge and crafting skills, I'll use durable Damascus that takes time and meticulous attention to detail. Thats the kind of integrity I want to build on this platform.   
The Hawk ( 100% Damascus Paring Knife )
I know the fact that its important to properly heat the Damascus as its vital part of the whole process. Also once its ready, I'll be making sure that every knife has quality the finish, baring in mind that it can rise my costs but it is also my job to provide you with great finish.   
PLAY

Cutting ,chopping ,peeling ,slicing or even dicing with this mini beast.
For me, selling online on various e commerce platforms isn't pleasing as I don't feel well connected with the potential buyers. Therefore, I have chosen "Kickstarter" platform as my start, so I build upon my knowledge and a direct interaction with you all. 
Since it's my first project in line, consumer feedback is very important to me and thats why I have decided to keep the prices very reasonable. Though, I believe in providing quality, price is just for the hardwork which is going at the background. As you save, I build integrity, relationship and knowledge. 
The Hawk
100% Damascus paring knife; Designed & created to serve as paring knife, its simple, elegant & fully comfortable while in hands.
Hawk ( 100% Damascus Paring knife )
 With 330 Layers of steel, full tang & wooden handle 
I am introducing "The Hawk" in 2 sizes, (20cm & 24cm) as I feel that will give best combination. I have handcrafted and used traditional skills to come up with these designs. I have given a thought process and attributes which are key, such as;
Hand Forged Damascus Steel
Ergonomics & Well Balanced
Durable Handle
Superior Sharpness
The Hawk Pair ( 24cm & 20 cm )
Ergonomically designed Walnut wood handle ensures a firm grip, comfort and add touch of elegance. 
The Hawk ( Damascus Paring Knife )
 The sheaths are of this pattern more or less, the final look may differ a bit but is make of 100% leather.
 Walnut wood & brass pins adds grace to this knife
PLAY

This item is produced in limited quantities only. This means that every piece is unique. Sizes & finish may vary lightly from piece to piece.
PLAY

 Smooth cuts with no drag or food stick, easy to clean and stays sharp
 The knife is not a showpiece, its fully functional and heat-treated to take the impact.
The Hawk ( Damascus Paring Knife )
 Its designed to give comfort to the palm. 
 Full tang blade (Its entirely a single length with no soldering ) 
Beautiful design with precious look & sharp with full tang all adds character to this hawkish knife and make it a real Kitchen Hawk. 
 There are many things I want to achieve through this platform, For someone new, it does makes it harder to overcome certain aspects of the project. I am fully confident that with my effort and your support, I will be to tackle any difficulties.  All the shipping will be done before Christmas holidays. I will ensure that each one of you have this before the actual delivery date.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As this is my first project so i assume that there are few risk factors which this project may encounter

a) 10% chances are there may be some delays depending on the final knife quantity as every 1 wants before December & the maker could serve our order late 

b) Logistics though i have got all details and basics that are required still looking for better logistics so backers could get the post quick & safe delivery

c) Having no experience of full fill the project but this i am sure we all on this forum learned from our projects 

Apart of the above mentioned challenges , still i am sure that there is little chance of delay as the above mentioned challenges can be met but nature causes & circumstances do persists
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
“The Nimble has integrated a USB-C QC/PD port to ensure optimized charging for mobile phones, laptops, tablets, and other compatible gadgets..” – Interesting Engineering
 “But you can get this on Amazon?.....Simply put, No..... there is no other travel adapter with dual type-c output ports which can power up to 35W. The Nimble truly is a new design made for modern tech which require more power and faster charging times..” – Geeky Gadgets
“Amazing Build Quality….. Not Your Everyday Travel Adapter With USB Ports.” – Mike Shouts
“Capable of powering six devices at once, this 35W travel adapter works in over 150 different countries.” – Gadget Flow


 The Nimble – A true global travel adapter supporting over 150 countries with full compatibility with all QC and PD Devices (Quick Charge and Power Delivery). Gone were the days of carrying your laptop charger, phone charger, power converter – replace all of these with a single Nimble. 

 1 Nimble - 6 devices 
One adaptor to rule them all - The Nimble can accommodate up to 6 devices at the same time, without sacrificing any charging performance across its USB -A and USB - C ports
We rely on the broad range of electronics when travelling to keep us occupied during long journeys. That doesn’t mean you should have to bring broad range of chargers that simply take up valuable baggage space.
 
Is it the same as the Travel Adapter on Amazon?
We have picked some of the bestsellers on Amazon to show you why the Nimble is truly unique with a dedicated USB-C output unlike traditional adapter which will share power across output ports. 



Independently Powered Ports - Quick Charge and Power Delivery
Imagine if everyone in a large restaurant shared one single waiter.
The same way traditional travel adaptors share power across all its outlets. Nimble however, offers each of your devices its own personal service. No compromise. No loss of performance.
The Nimble utilizes 2 independent circuit boards to power the main plug, the USB-C PD/QC and the 3x USB-A/1x USB-C output – resulting in  dedicated power through its USB-C QC/PD port to ensure optimized charging for all QC and PD compatible devices – traditional chargers will share power between all the ports resulting in slow charging.



Compared With Other Travel Chargers 


Travel, Home, Office 
Whether you are travelling long distances or commuting between home and the office, the Nimble fits perfectly into your life without occupying noticeable space. Small and sleek, definitely a charger we are not used to.
 The 35W Power Delivery is perfect to replace those big clunky laptop chargers we are so use to. 

USB-C to USB-C and USB-C to Lightning


Rewards
ADD On Menu: Because Your Nimble Deserves the Best 
Once you’ve backed the project, you can add additional cables. Simply increase your pledge by the corresponding HKD dollar amount. When the campaign ends, we’ll send you a survey asking which items you want. 


Detailed Specs



Charge Safe….With Nimble
PLAY

The Nimble charges safe with multiple layers of inbuilt protection so you can power and charge your gadgets with no worries. The Nimble uses over voltage protection, current stabiliser and over heating protection - One less thing to worry about when you are traveling abroad. 




Charge Like A Local, Travel Like A Pro
Charge like a local and travel like a pro, never worry about not having the correct adapter as the Nimble covers over 150 countries. Never be caught out again when travelling to another country.
 Prototype 
The Nimble has been designed by a collective of travellers to be the ultimate travel gadget you need for any type of travel. Next time you set off on a new adventure, travel light, travel nimble and you will not regret it.
Timeline
Team
It has been an amazing journey and with your help we can bring this project to life, a simple idea has grown to become something that we honestly believe is the best travel adapter on the market right now.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have worked tirelessly to deliver our first campaign to the Kickstarter community to avoid any disappointment. And we cannot wait until you guys get to share this journey with us.
Life sometimes throws us a curveball and there are always unforeseeable risks and challenges, and we are committed to rectify any issues for the customer should the situation occur.
We want this true redesign of the classic travel adapter as much as anyone else and won't stop until we deliver the best Travel Adapter there is on the market.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Facing 2021 with New Hope from Our Valued Customers
updates.update_content:
Wishing you a filled success, happiness, and prosperity this new year. Hoping you and your family are safe and healthy in spite of this pandemic.
The year 2020 was hard for all of us. From the worldwide lockdown to the economic crisis, and lives that were lost, we stand with you in these trying times and hope for the recovery of every nation.

With this, we would like to apologize for any inconvenience which happened last year on our part and assure you that no problems like these will happen in the future. As part of the company’s solutions, we have begun putting a comprehensive plan in place to provide better and convenient customer service. In fact, the company has sorted almost all issues and concerns that arise during and after the campaign.

[IMPORTANT] Onwards and Upwards
We thank every backer for their patience these past few months as we have been fighting an uphill battle from the get-go which has unfortunately impacted you guys, our backers who have helped us get here.
After much deliberation we have decided to refund the 2.5% of backers who did not receive their Nimble due to logistics delays and errors.

campaign.story:
Following two successful campaigns, Ensō Essential is our next collection of pure titanium cutlery sets made with affordability in mind. Ensō Collection was created to promote healthier eating and eco-sustainability.


Whether it’s fine dining, daily breakfast or a picnic with friends, enjoy Enso’s comfort and style on every occasion. Made with highest-quality pure medical grade titanium, Ensō brings the experience of fine dining to your table. 


When titanium is exposed in air, a very thin layer of titanium atoms interact with the oxygen to create a nano-coating of titanium dioxide (Titania). Titania-based nanocomposites subjected to light are remarkably effective in repelling microbial growth. Making your food not only safer to eat, but tastes fresher and better.
 
Remember the weird taste of stainless steel? Titanium is completely tasteless — it’s almost like a natural part of you. It's used widely in high-end jewelry because it causes no allergic reaction — good news if you struggle to find a set without stainless steel and nickel.


With a high quality portable carrying case, now you can bring Ensō with you anytime, anywhere.


Titanium is natural, non-toxic and eco-friendly material. Ensō is made from pure medical grade titanium which is considered as the most biocompatible metal due to its non-corrosive nature.


It's almost indestructible and it can withstand seawater for 4000 years without any corrosion. Needless to say — it's dishwasher safe. You can pass it onto your children and their children’s children. 4000 years is a long time in an era of one-time-use disposable cutleries. That’s why we provide a lifetime warranty on every Ensō set.
 

Ensō Essential Fork
Ensō Essential Spoon
Ensō Essential Knife
Ensō Essential Chopsticks (with round smooth edges)
Ensō Essential Chopsticks (with improved grip)

We are expanding our colour pallet with two additional options from the start — Gold & Stealth Black. These are special limited editions made for Kickstarter backers only!

Each item will be numbered and packed in a special handmade bamboo box and will include one free Carrying case.
New bonus for backers!



For every Reward you can add some $$ to preorder additional items. You can confirm your order during the baker survey once campaign ends.
Includes Ensō Essential Fork, Knife, Tablespoon, Teaspoon, Chopsticks, Straw and Carrying case
Includes 1 free Carrying case


PressKit
For Press Inquiries: ti22@thingyfy.com
For Wholesale Inquiries: ti22@thingyfy.com
For General Inquiry & Support: info@thingyfy.com




Quality check under the microscope


This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 800+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $350MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our team has years of experience in designing and delivering amazing pure titanium products. We have a plan and a schedule to do the same with Ensō.

We have one promise to you: "Guaranteed shipping or your money back."

We take pride in being open with our backers, and have a history of being transparent. We understand that regular communication is key, whether things are going great, or not so well. We also love this work, and we'll do our best to make this process educational and entertaining for you as well. So in addition to keeping you up to date on general progress, we will also strive to give you an in-depth look at the process of refining and delivering fantastic products.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Have you ever grated fresh natural wasabi by yourself just to taste it?
For example, we sometimes hear an opinion of someone saying that “I’m not keen on wasabi that stings my nose at the moment of eating it.”
The natural wasabi gives a rich flavor in your mouth and then the gentle hotness comes later.
This time, we have designed and developed the soy-sauce plate, named “wasabi-yama” (horse-radish mountain) so that wasabi-lovers can fully enjoy wasabi.
It is a soy-sauce plate which wasabi-lovers will love and can enjoy wasabi to the full.
We would be pleased if you could try it together with fresh wasabi! Off course you can enjoy with wasabi tube.
The wasabi-yama was created from the thought to have more wasabi more freely.
When people ordered a plate of some mixed sashimi at a restaurant, a little amount of wasabi was offered on the edge of the plate and everyone shared it, picking it with their chopsticks. 
It was not really comfortable thing to do for each people.
“And above all, there was too little of it!!”
“How could I have the delicious dishes with more wasabi, more freely, we wondered?”
This “wasabi-yama” came out of these thoughts.
While we were thinking about what kind of plate, people can enjoy more wasabi more freely then, we heard of this talk.
“People in Edo (Tokyo) won’t allow wasabi to soak in the soy-sauce.”
Pic2
We were inspired by it and tried to make a “new plate for wasabi” and this is its shape.
The wasabi-lovers who might once have wished to monopolize the wasabi can do it with this one!
Size: 11 cm diameter x 3.35cm height
Instruction: Place wasabi on the top of the mountain and pour some soy-sauce around in the plate.
▲Hizen-yoshida Pottery details http://www.yoshidayaki.jp/process/#prettyPhoto
It is made on a one-by-one basis with great care.
The white porcelain in the Arita area has a beautiful white color as its character. 
The whiteness of this plate comes from the clay itself and the glaze which has been used is colorless and transparent.
So, the natural whiteness from the clay appears and this pure white texture is there to see.
For obtaining this result, good quality raw materials have been chosen. 

For a mass production of the white porcelain, the mold is necessary.
There are 3 types of mold, such as 
1 throw away mold (sample mold)
2 case mold
3 use mold (a mass production mold). 
They are needed to be made depending on each stage.
1. After inventing a design, a mold (①throw away mold) which is used as a sample (master) is made.
2. Make a mold (②case mold) for verification ①abandoned mold as a model and then after checking the repeatability of the size and shape, produce the duplicate mold for the mass production (③use mold).
3. Pour the fluid viscos called mud in the ③ and make an original mold.
4. Bake it as it is in the mold to stabilize it. (unglazed pottery)
5. Pour the glaze on the surface of the vessel to make a film on it. 
 During the bisque-firing, the glaze melts and vitrifies the surface. 
(glazing)
6. Then, bake it for 12~14 hours with a temperature of 1300℃.
(high temperature firing in a big kiln)
 *This is the important process which largely influences the glaze, the color of the paint and the gloss.
The work of this time is to produce a product made by using a mold, but it is a very delicate process which requires various adjustments according to the weather and humidity of the day.
If the glaze isn’t put on evenly, the uneven color appears after a high temperature firing in a big kiln and it is a persevering work which is required to check the mold one by one during the firing.
It is the creative world in which the experience of the experienced craftsman is important.
We would like to create the enjoyable daily life using the tableware with which you can enjoy your meals.
Nowadays, we can enjoy the nice food anywhere, and we think that people are interested in what to eat, but they are not bothered in what tools to eat them from.
“We would like people to eat the delicious foods together with the enjoyable tools.”
PLAY

The meals while having fun make daily life rich.
We really want to design these kinds of products from now on.
Also, we would like to create the environment and the way of economy for not only the hand-craftsmen who create things but also the ones who mine the raw materials and also the ones who manage mountains doing a wonderful work with a fair price through the “product design”.
It is a set that you can receive and can easily experience the wasabi-yama, just by your initial support as a kickstarter.  
The wasabi, wood and soy sauce bottle listed in the photo are not included in this set. It is just an image.
The “first wasabi-yama set” has been prepared for you in order to enjoy the genuine wasabi with the 「wasabi-yama」.
We would like you to enjoy the freshly graded wasabi with the wasabi-yama to the full.

Visit our website
I’m Yusaku Sakai from “FROM NIPPON (Japan)”.
I have been working as a freelance product designer up to now.
It is a business to introduce a new product design which goes well withthe modern life style, using the skill from the local industry and the traditional crafts all over Japan.
Visit our website
In order to achieve the coming together of the “handwork quality” and the ”design” which gives interest to the customer’s life, we have been proceeding with a project, called 『FROM NIPPON』( Japan).
It is a project which not only “protects” craftsmen but also “develops” as well as creates products and shows them to the world as a world class standard.
This wasabi-yama is one of these activities and will be the first step of the future development. 
We would be very grateful, if you could support this first step. 
Even you who might not like wasabi may love it with the fresh wasabi!

campaign.story:
S.Kismet is an unspoken feeling – a destiny – unique to each person. 
S.Kismet is a handmade and hand-cut Bohemia crystal ware brand. With a deep respect for crystal-making, S.Kismet creates unique yet modern designs that adheres to traditional crystal-making techniques. S.Kismet cooperates with top 150 year old crystal manufacturers in Czech Republic to create the finest quality crystal gift ware. 
Dreamer Crystal Cup with Polished Cuts
Starlight Crystal Cup with Matte Cuts
Handmade crystal ware has existed in Czech for hundreds of years and by knowing the complex process that goes into crystal making, S.Kismet aims to capture the artisanal spirit in all our products. Each piece is 100% mouth blown and hand cut.
The reason we made this brand is to create products that bring hope and warmth to each unique individual. We believe each person is the most special in the world.
We hope you can feel the joy through the hand-cut starry sky.
We are S.Kismet, a unique gift made for A SPECIAL YOU.
Dreamer Crystal Cup with Polished Cuts
Starlight Crystal Cup with Matte Cuts - Top View
Starlight and Dreamer Crystal Cups
Single Cup Packaging
Packaging for Gift Set


Our Manufacturing Process in Czech Republic
Check out our story here 
Visit Our Site
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We work with only the most skilled crystal makers in Czech Republic to ensure that we offer only top-quality products. Production lead times are longer but as we have developed a good partnership, we are working to ensure production and delivery timelines are met.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello dear backers, thanks for your interest to our project. This is continuation of our original Kickstarter project - Sens the most minimalistic pen. We got ton of great comments to our project, which you can read below.
Also, a lot of our customers asked about the opportunity to choose body and cap colors separately, so now we have 12 colors (instead of original 4 colors).
To make even more personal touch, we added an opportunity to add Personal Engraving for leather accessories and pen stand.
Example of Personal Engraving option on leather notebook cover, wooden pen stand and leather pen sleeve
OUR NEW COLORS

 I think my previous backers will say better than me :) Haha
THE PEN.
       Pen is the essential attribute of our everyday life. It is not just a writing instrument, it is tool for self-expression. It embodies soul and wisdom of its owner. Pen is an extension of your thoughts, goals and achievements.


       Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.


Specifications: 
Minimalistic design
Perfect balance
Ergonomic design
Anodized aircraft aluminum
CNC-machined
Wooden pen stand
Schmidt P8126 capless roller ball pen refill (0,6 mm)
Comparable with any Parker style G2 refills


Twisting mechanism in work.
Dimensions & weight: 
Length 136 mm (5,35 in)
Diameter at widest point - 11mm, at narrowest – 9mm
Weight – 28 grams (1 oz)

Our pen consists only from two solid metal parts, refill and spring.
 CHOOSE YOUR COLOR.

PEN STAND. 
        We put a lot of attention to our packaging too, as it makes the first impression on product. Every pen will be packed in beautifully designed box. Also it could be a pen stand on your desk. We made stands in walnut, for perfect match with your interior.
Black Sens pen with walnut pen stand
Packaging of a Sens pen.
PEN CASE.  
        To keep your pen safe, we made a minimalistic sleeve. It`s made from a solid piece of vegetable tanned leather, which will gain deep rich tint as time goes by. Every sleeve is hand sewn with great attention to every stitch.
Beige, red, brown and black pen sleeves
Minimalistic leather pen sleeve.
 REWARDS.



ADD-ONS.
       The add-ons are added to your original EXISTING reward that you pledged for. You can add a pen sleeve or an extra refill to your current pledge. To add an add-on, simply include the amount in the pledge.
For example:
        If you made a $39 SENS PEN pledge and you would like to add a pen sleeve (+12$) and an extra refill (+3$), simply add $15 to your pledge and enter "54$" without changing the reward category.
DESIGN. 
               The pen was reinvented. Our pen is very simple, it consists only from two solid parts. A subtle teardrop shape, gives it a great balance to write, with comfort and steadiness. The pen fits nicely in a hand and does not slip.
Sens pen is perfectly balanced.




      The pen is made from aluminum, known for its durability and lightness. Precision machinery and skillful workers are needed to create the perfect writing instrument for you.
Machining Sens pen
WRITING.   
       Not only the pen looks good, it writes even better. We have tried and tested different types of ink and have chosen the best one for you. It is an innovative system for smooth and elegant writing. It combines the convenience of a ballpoint pen with the individual writing characteristics of a fountain pen. Every pen will come with Schmidt P8126 capless roller ball refill, perfect for writing, drawing and taking notes.
       If you will need a replacement, you won`t have problems finding it. Our pen is compatible with any Parker-style G2 refill (more than 100), which is a standard refill for a variety of pens. So whenever you’ll need it, there will always be a plenty to choose from.
       We came a long way from first sketches to final prototype. Now we need your SUPPORT to start full production. We need funds for manufacturing, assembling, packaging and shipping to YOU.
NOTEBOOK COVER.
PLAY

       To keep your pen and notebook together, we created a simple, yet functional cover. Under its minimalist look there are compartments for the notebook and pen, two slots for cards and a small pocket for some little things that may be handy throughout your day. The cover is also a stylish accessory that's hard to let off your hands, moreover to forget at home.
       The cover is made from natural vegetable tanned leather to give it strength and a nice texture. It also develops a rich tint as time goes on. The leather is cut with a laser for precision and accuracy that are impossible to achieve while cutting by hand.
      But the sewing is only done manually – it is far more difficult, but the stitches come out stronger and last longer. As a final step, we carefully treat the edges of the leather to give the cover its finished look and provide you with a product that is ideal in every detail.
       Simple like everything ingenious, this set is great to have around. It gives an ability to write down, sketch, plan and organize your plans and ideas to turn them into successful achievements in the future.
Specifications:
Vegetable tanned leather
Nylon thread
Hand sewn
Pen sleeve
155mm x 115mm ( 6,1 " x 4,5 " )
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have experience with 6 successful projects on Kickstarter, so process of production and delivery is well established. With help of our successful Kickstarter projects, we have more than 2000 happy backers around the world. Sometimes problems come and I promise that I will do everything possible to satisfy your expectations. Now we are ready to start full production and bring it to YOU as soon as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
All rewards have now been sent, and you should all receive yours very soon ! 
We would like to thank each and everyone of you for your kind support . We will now work hard to try and come up yet again with an innovtive  idea !
THANK YOU !!!

Thank you all so much for your patience, sendings have started, and tracking numbers will be uploaded on Backer Kit as the process goes,  starting later today. You have never been closer to receiving your rewards !
Wishing you all a fantastic 2020 with many words to write....

Production is running smoothly and we are pleased to confirm that sendings will begin at the very end of this month until mid-January - We will give you an update when all rewards have been sent out and last but not least we wish you all a blissful end of the year and wonderful holidays to everyone !!

You have 24 hours left to fill in your survey ( for those who have not yet) , all those who still have not by that deadine will be imposed their(s) pen finishing and tip size(s) at time of reward sending.
We are indeed almost there, surveys were sent, most of them filled, but for those who haven't filled theirs yet, there are only 3 days left !! So please hurry, not to be left out ;-) !

Hello everyone and thank you again for your support! Thanks to you, we have passed the 300% funded goal!
Don't hesitate to share the campaign, there are only a few days left before the end :)

We also wanted to share one (and only one) crush we had for a campaign: GPCA Carabiner - Most Funded Carabiner Ever
For every reward package , you will be able to add, at survey time, any extra that you may need ! (tips, inks, pouches..)
2 Ink bottles and 2 boxes of cartridges are also provided in this package, you can pledge safely and be assured that they will indeed be included in your reward !
Thank you all so much, could not have been done without you !!!

campaign.story:
Our EDC BamPen is an irreplaceable thing for each person and one of the most practical and interesting things. Our handle is perfect for any pocket, and its stability on the surface will amaze you! You no longer have to worry and fuss. 
The shape of bamboo perfectly combines with ergonomics. The elegant arc fits fingers and is easy to control. Each arc of the body and corner angle is calculated accurately and tested for measurement bringing your writing to life! 
EDC BamPen uses a bamboo bud design and refillable long life German ball-pens that can fully meet your daily use . The pen looks and feels so good in your hand. The Bamboo Pen and Graver Knife combination is a working piece of art.  Everyone you know will want to borrow it! 
Unlike the pens on the market, EDC BamPen's caps are designed with a magnetic cap to prevent the cap loss. You can magnetize the other end of the pen in instant. 
Magnetic forces pull the cap onto the pen
We designed the EDC BamPen to have a perfect balance in your hand. So your writing will always be in maximum comfort. 
From creative minds comes a creative pen - natural and unique. Write your legend. 
The G2 Refill is a very large refill that can be written to 10,000 meters long and 25 times that of a regular refill. We used a G2 refill because we love the way it writes. With the G2 Refill bringing you an experience of quite smooth writing. Who doesn’t like variety, right?
The refills by German company ensure that the EDC BamPen provides a smooth ink flow and the best writing experience for you.
We added anti-slip beads to the broken window cap,  No matter what kind of table you put the EDC BamPen on, it won’t slip. 
Anti-roll design of Bampen surfaces
We wanted to design a pen different from others. Not just for the exquisite workmanship and appearance, but also does more than just a precise writing tool. We combined Paper Carving and a well-writing pen together that allows you to excite inspiration and release stress in your everyday life.
Hand carved
DIY and hand-carving to increase the fun and inspiration of life
The blade of the engraving knife can be taken down at any time, and the new blade can be replaced when the blade is broken. We will give you 10 blades for free. 
The other end of the pen is a window breaker. You only need to open the cap to use it as a window breaker. Whether in the car or in any dangerous situation, you can protect yourself as a tool. 
EDC BamPen is precision machined from brass. These remarkable materials have the highest durability.
The finishes consist of hand blasted, hand polished and PVD. Of those three surface techniques we offer you four different colors: Silver, Rose Gold, and Black. A different choice for  whatever moods you happen to be in. You can give a friend, girlfriend or family. Or just make an original gift to yourself.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Trusting us you are helping our project to life and see the light in order to extend it. We use only high quality and genuine materials in our products, so you should not worry! 

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Alpha™ Pillow is a carbon infused memory foam pillow, with air cell breathability, ultra soft bamboo, pure silver fibers, and ice silk technology for instant coolness.
The Cooling Ice Silk technology helps wick away moisture and body heat to help you feel cooler so that you can fall asleep faster. Providing instant coolness and ultimate comfort.  
Silver has been used by NASA, US Special Forces, and Olympic athletes to create germ free textiles. Bamboo charcoal’s activated carbon absorb toxins, prevents mould growth and purifies air by absorbing harmful gasses.
Air Cells increase comfort and breathability that is linked to sweating and snoring during sleeping. The combination of the textiles wick moisture away twice as fast as cotton, reducing the humidity in your bed by up to 50%. 
The problem with traditional pillows is that they require porous materials to create a soft comfortable feel. In as little as 7 days, millions of colony forming units of bacteria can grow inside this permeable space where mold and other pathogens can thrive. This leads to allergies, skin irritation and many illnesses. 
Alpha's bamboo charcoal infused memory foam allows the pillow to mould into the shape of your head and neck, supporting the sensitive pressure areas to help you relax and help with insomnia. 
Impinged nerves can trigger migraines, ensuring that your spine is alined correctly in its natural position it will minimize nerve irritation. It will also help to relieve muscle tension around the neck area. 
Alpha allows your spine to be alined and it elevates your upper body, unblocking the airways and opening nasal passages so you can breathe easier. Alpha's Dimensions: 60 x 40 x 12 cm.
Silver binds to essential cell components like DNA to neutralize their harmful effect. The process of minimizing the bacteria helps with eliminating odor, prevents allergies such as skin irritations, pimples, asthma, runny nose, sneezing and more. It has taken years of development for silver fabrics to arrive at this level of quality.  
The benefits of silver used by NASA, U.S. Special Forces as well as Athletes, providing effective antimicrobial properties, which means it naturally destroys odor-causing pathogens.
To add any of our Alpha™ Collection products,  please click on your “Manage your pledge” button (on top side when you open the project page), than click “Change your pledge” and simply add to the total cost. For multiple quantities please multiply the product's cost. 
You will be able to select your preferred size or weight in the survey after the campaign ends. 
*Additional International Shipping will apply during the survey for all add-ons. 
Ivana T. Lowchareonkul is a Product Designer. She has a passion for simple interfaces. She is the ultimate problem solver and loves to create innovative products.
Science is something that she greatly enjoys. "It challenges ideas that we think are ‘right’! There is always something new and interesting to discover and the journey to get there can be really, really exciting.” said Ivana.
Ivana has played critical leadership roles in 14 successfully funded and fulfilled Kickstarter projects that have raised over $3,000,000 to over 17,000 backers. Her keen eye for innovation has given her multiple opportunities to create successful products. Her experience in manufacturing has been perfected and she is very excited to bring Alpha Sheets to volume production. 
Our past projects: 

Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

Our biggest challenge is to ensure that the quality meets our expectations. We will work very closely with our manufacturing partners to make sure Alpha™ Pillow is made and delivered with highest premium quality.

We are all ready to start manufacturing and together we can help to improve the lives of millions. The future of sleep is here today.
